/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a driver's viewpoint on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky above. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. A solitary figure can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the otherwise still scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of daylight, casting long shadows and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
